1011010111110000 0010110100101110 1 -> sum: 1110001100011111, cout: 0

1000001010100011 1001100101110110 0 -> sum: 0001110000011001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
